H0.text: The film '10 things I hate about you', was inspired by which of Shakespeare's plays. A Midsummer Night's Dream

H1.text: The film '10 things I hate about you', was inspired by which of Shakespeare's plays. The Taming of the Shrew

H2.text: The film '10 things I hate about you', was inspired by which of Shakespeare's plays. Romeo and Juliet

H3.text: The film '10 things I hate about you', was inspired by which of Shakespeare's plays. TTOTS

A4.text: The 1999 high‑school comedy film 10 Things I Hate About You is loosely based on The Taming of the Shrew.
